code: import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{faStar}from"@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons";import{FontAwesomeIcon}from"@fortawesome/react-fontawesome";import"./BlogList.css";const BlogList=({blogs,title,removeBlog})=>{const blogOnClick=blog=>e=>{let fadeDuration=500;let elt=e.currentTarget;elt.style.animation="";setTimeout(()=>{elt.style.animation="fade ".concat(fadeDuration,"ms ease-out forward");},0);setTimeout(()=>{removeBlog(blog.id);},fadeDuration);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"blog",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"blog-title",children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"blogs",children:blogs.map((blog,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"blog-preview",style:{animation:"appear 600ms ease-out ".concat(index*300,"ms backwards")},role:"button",onClick:blogOnClick(blog),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"blog__title",children:blog.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"blog__author",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"author",children:blog.author}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"likes",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:{marginRight:"0.3rem"},children:blog.likes}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faStar})]})]})]},index))})]});};export default BlogList;
